org.jetel.mapping.element

Class CloverMappingElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.mapping.element.CloverMappingElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingSource, MappingTarget

    public class CloverMappingElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements MappingSource, MappingTarget
    This class contains clover mapping element that is consisted from port name and field name.
